articles.title: NASA WARNING! Strongest Solar Flares in years may cause blackouts on Earth - HT Tech
articles.description: Wednesday witnessed the strongest solar flares detected from the sun in years. The solar flares volleyed particles which are causing blackouts in Australia, Western Pacific and Eastern Asia. The solar flares might have additional effects as well. Read on to f…

articles.title: Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra's baby girl's name finally revealed - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: The baby, born via surrogate in January this year, is named Malti Marie Chopra Jonas.
articles.content:
More than three months after Nick Jonas and Priyanka Chopra announced the birth of their baby daughter via surrogate, we are finally learning her name.

articles.description: U.S. Federal Reserve Chairman Jerome Powell said Thursday the central bank is committed to hiking rates "expeditiously" to tame inflation.
articles.content:
